trans-unit.id: Currently, you can only get Now Playing from Apple Music, because it's a native system call without the integration of any third-party components. There is no point in getting Now Playing from Spotify since it requires jumping from a bunch more hoops, and the widget doesn't refresh enough for it to be worth it.
trans-unit.source: Currently, you can only get Now Playing from Apple Music, because it's a native system call without the integration of any third-party components. There is no point in getting Now Playing from Spotify since it requires jumping from a bunch more hoops, and the widget doesn't refresh enough for it to be worth it.
trans-unit.target: Attualmente, è possibile ottenere i dati della musica in riproduzione solo da Apple Music, poiché l'operazione è una chiamata di sistema nativa, senza l'integrazione di componenti terzi. E' possibile ottenere questi dati da Spotify, ma dal momento che richiederebbe troppi passaggi per farlo, il widget non si aggiornerebbe in tempo, e non ne varrebbe la pena.

trans-unit.id: If you are wondering why the live timer updates every second, but not anything else, it's because Apple provided that one feature as an exception. Widgy is using that feature as time since 0:00 (24 hour time) or 12:00 am/pm (12 hour time).
trans-unit.source: If you are wondering why the live timer updates every second, but not anything else, it's because Apple provided that one feature as an exception. Widgy is using that feature as time since 0:00 (24 hour time) or 12:00 am/pm (12 hour time).
trans-unit.target: Se ti stai chiedendo perché i timer si aggiornano ogni secondo, ma non tutto il resto, è perché Apple ha fornito questa possibilità come eccezione. Widgy utilizza questa funzione come tempo dalle 0:00 (24 ore) o 12:00 am/pm (12 ore).

trans-unit.id: If you encounter an error during sync, just try again—it often resolves itself.
trans-unit.source: If you encounter an error during sync, just try again—it often resolves itself.

trans-unit.id: If you'd like to use the new iOS 17 widget reload, which doesn't open the Widgy app, make sure that 'Widget Action' is set to 'Reload Widget' or 'Button', 'Vibrate' is either set to 'No' or 'Yes', and 'External Action' is set to 'Return To Home Screen'. Also, this won't work on Live Activities and Dynamic Island.
trans-unit.source: If you'd like to use the new iOS 17 widget reload, which doesn't open the Widgy app, make sure that 'Widget Action' is set to 'Reload Widget' or 'Button', 'Vibrate' is either set to 'No' or 'Yes', and 'External Action' is set to 'Return To Home Screen'. Also, this won't work on Live Activities and Dynamic Island.

trans-unit.id: Watchy is only available on the latest major watchOS version, so be sure you're up to date with system updates.
trans-unit.source: Watchy is only available on the latest major watchOS version, so be sure you're up to date with system updates.
trans-unit.target: Watchy è disponibile sulle versioni più recenti di WatchOS. Assicurati di avere l’ultima versione.

trans-unit.id: Watchy isn't a complete replacement for stock Apple Watch Watch Faces, since there are no developer APIs to make them stay as permanent Watch Faces.
trans-unit.source: Watchy isn't a complete replacement for stock Apple Watch Watch Faces, since there are no developer APIs to make them stay as permanent Watch Faces.
trans-unit.target: Watchy non sostituisce i quadranti di Apple Watch, in quanto non ci sono API per sviluppatori che permettono di crearli.

trans-unit.id: Watchy requires various permissions; depending on the type of data that is being displayed on the current Watch Face.
trans-unit.source: Watchy requires various permissions; depending on the type of data that is being displayed on the current Watch Face.
trans-unit.target: Watchy ha bisogno di diversi permessi in base ai dati che si sceglie di visualizzare nel quadrante.

trans-unit.id: Watchy should be opened and visible on screen during the Sync.
trans-unit.source: Watchy should be opened and visible on screen during the Sync.
trans-unit.target: Watchy deve essere aperto e visibile durante il sync.

trans-unit.id: Watchy supports custom date formatting with a build-in 'dateFormatter()' and 'localizedDateFormatter()' methods, in the same format as the Text layers custom date.
trans-unit.source: Watchy supports custom date formatting with a build-in 'dateFormatter()' and 'localizedDateFormatter()' methods, in the same format as the Text layers custom date.
trans-unit.target: Watchy supporta formattazioni di data personalizzate con i metodi dateFormatter() e localizedDateFormatter().

trans-unit.id: Watchy uses a different Javascript runtime so some results may differ from the Widgys Javascript.
trans-unit.source: Watchy uses a different Javascript runtime so some results may differ from the Widgys Javascript.
trans-unit.target: Watchy usa un diverso javascript runtime, perciò i risultati possono variare da quelli del javascript Widgy.

trans-unit.id: We've opened the translation process up to the community because you know best how Widgy should be translated into your language. Please follow the instructions written on the translation page.
trans-unit.source: We've opened the translation process up to the community because you know best how Widgy should be translated into your language. Please follow the instructions written on the translation page.

trans-unit.note: Create Tab Top Actions Settings View

trans-unit.id: When designing your Watch Face, use the dual light/dark mode colors. On Watchy dark mode colors are being used when Always On Display is enabled.
trans-unit.source: When designing your Watch Face, use the dual light/dark mode colors. On Watchy dark mode colors are being used when Always On Display is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Quando crei un quadrante, usa il colore luce/scuro. In Watchy, i colori scuri verranno usati per l’alwaysOn display.

trans-unit.id: When editing a widget, how do I choose the font size?
trans-unit.source: When editing a widget, how do I choose the font size?
trans-unit.target: Quando modifico un widget, come scelgo la dimensione dei caratteri?

trans-unit.id: When everything is filled in correctly, tap the ✓ in the top right to finish.
trans-unit.source: When everything is filled in correctly, tap the ✓ in the top right to finish.

trans-unit.id: While in low power mode, Widgets refresh less frequent.
trans-unit.source: While in low power mode, Widgets refresh less frequent.
trans-unit.target: In modalità Basso Consumo, i widget si aggiornano meno frequentemente.

trans-unit.id: While widgets can't be natively transparent, you can place a special 'Transparent widget' image on the bottom layer of your widget.
trans-unit.source: While widgets can't be natively transparent, you can place a special 'Transparent widget' image on the bottom layer of your widget.
trans-unit.target: Dal momento che i widget non possono essere trasparenti, puoi usare un immagine “widget trasparente” come strato più basso.

trans-unit.id: While widgets can't be natively transparent, you can place an image on the bottom layer of your widget that is a cropped version of your wallpaper. Widgy has an crop tool that can help you with this.
trans-unit.source: While widgets can't be natively transparent, you can place an image on the bottom layer of your widget that is a cropped version of your wallpaper. Widgy has an crop tool that can help you with this.
trans-unit.target: Dal momento che i widget non possono essere trasparenti, è possibile inserire un'immagine come strato inferiore del widget, che sarà una versione ritagliata del tuo sfondo. Widgy ha uno strumento apposito che ti aiuterà a farlo.

trans-unit.id: Why aren't the Watch Faces on my Series 3 full screen?
trans-unit.source: Why aren't the Watch Faces on my Series 3 full screen?
trans-unit.target: Perché i quadranti non sono a tutto schermo sul mio Apple Watch serie 3?

trans-unit.id: Widget won't display all data properly.
trans-unit.source: Widget won't display all data properly.
trans-unit.target: Il widget non visualizza tutti i dati correttamente.

trans-unit.id: Widgets are limited to a budget of just 30 MB of system memory. Adding a Dark Mode variant of the image increases the chances of overflowing that memory budget.
trans-unit.source: Widgets are limited to a budget of just 30 MB of system memory. Adding a Dark Mode variant of the image increases the chances of overflowing that memory budget.
trans-unit.target: I widget sono limitati a una dimensione di 30MB di memoria. Aggiungere uno sfondo per la dark mode potrebbe aumentare la dimensione del widget fino a superarne il limite.

trans-unit.id: Widgets can fetch data every 15 minutes (that includes various things like Battery Status, Weather, Agenda, and Health).
trans-unit.source: Widgets can fetch data every 15 minutes (that includes various things like Battery Status, Weather, Agenda, and Health).
trans-unit.target: I widget possono recuperare dati ogni 15 minuti (questi includono diverse cose per esempio Stato batteria, Meteo, Caendario e Salute).

trans-unit.id: Widgets can update the display every minute. That means widgets can show the correct date and time, but other information will have a 15-minute 'lag'.
trans-unit.source: Widgets can update the display every minute. That means widgets can show the correct date and time, but other information will have a 15-minute 'lag'.
trans-unit.target: I widget possono aggiornare il display ogni minuto. Questo significa che data e ora saranno coretti, ma gli altri dati avranno un ritardo di 15 minuti.

trans-unit.id: Widgy will automatically reload all live activities when switching to the app. You can also add a reload tap action to the live activity to make it reloadable on a simple tap. Thanks to iOS 17, the widget will reload in place.

trans-unit.source: Widgy will sort all Tap Actions alphabetically and use whatever comes up first.

trans-unit.id: Woodsign may use third-party services to collect data about your device and your usage of Widgy and use it to improve the application experience and stability.
trans-unit.source: Woodsign may use third-party services to collect data about your device and your usage of Widgy and use it to improve the application experience and stability.

trans-unit.id: iPad users, take note! Widgets don't know the orientation of your device. In other words, you can have transparency either for portrait or landscape orientation BUT NOT FOR BOTH. Rotating your device will break the illusion of transparency.
trans-unit.source: iPad users, take note! Widgets don't know the orientation of your device. In other words, you can have transparency either for portrait or landscape orientation BUT NOT FOR BOTH. Rotating your device will break the illusion of transparency.
trans-unit.target: Utenti iPad, attenzione! I widget non distinguono l'orientamento del dispositivo: cio significa che è possibile creare la trasparenza per l'orientamento verticale o orizzontale, MA NON PER ENTRAMBI. Ruotando il dispositivo l'illusione della trasparenza sparirà.
